name: obscura - Discord Skin (BetterDiscord)
description: Sleek, modern discord skin for the discord client. Meant to fix the overly bright discord dark skin and add a little bit of popping red color. > Only works if discord is set to Settings/Appearance/Theme is set to "dark" < > Only works for the discord client with BetterDiscord installed (not Web) < ----------------------- Installation: 1. Visit obscura on github 2. Download obscura.theme.css 3. Open Discord with BetterDiscord installed (More on that here ) 4. Navigate to Settings/Appearance and make sure "Dark" is checked. 5. Navigate to Settings/Themes and click "Open Theme Folder". 6. Drop obscura.theme.css into the newly opened window 7. Activate the theme with the check-mark (8. You may need to reset Discord using Ctrl + R)
